description: In LibvirtNFSVolumeDriver._mount_nfs is only a call to mkdir to create the mountpoint. No check if the mountpoint already exists.
title: check if path exists before trying to create it (LibvirtNFSVolumeDriver._mount_nfs)

comments.content: In LibvirtNFSVolumeDriver._mount_nfs is only a call to mkdir to create the mountpoint. No check if the mountpoint already exists.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt
